Title: Suffer the Children
Plot: A school teacher terrifies parents with her supernatural ability to inspire artistic students.  Meanwhile, Richard and Lily are confronted by police, and Jordan warns Shawn not to overuse his healing gift.
GuestStars: Edd  Wright,  Stefan  Thordarson,  Santana   Shaw-Garlock,  Mylene Robic,  Rick Dobran,  Sean Owen Roberts,  Ben Cotton,  Kyle  Falconer,  D. Harlan Cutshall,  Rob Hayter,  Brett Delaney,  Bruce Dawson,  Jaren B
